feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 1:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: calm km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain or snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
